original:
The Pinacoteca de São Paulo has made history by becoming the first museum in over a century to host a contemporary Indigenous art exhibition. Titled "Véxoa," the exhibition features the works of 23 Indigenous artists from various ethnic backgrounds across Brazil. 

The name "Véxoa," derived from the Terena language, translates to "We Know." This exhibition aims to address and highlight significant issues currently facing Indigenous popu
